doc:
Singin' Sam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singin%27_Sam 0 Singin' Sam aka Harry Frankel (January 27, 1888, Springfield, Ohio -June 12, 1948, Richmond, Indiana) was a minstrel performer, vaudevillian and popular personality during the early days of radio. He was best known as "Singin' Sam, the Barbasol Man" for his long association with that company. Singin '_Sam_aka_Harry_Frankel ( January_27_,_1888 , Springfield , Ohio - June_12_,_1948_,_Richmond_,_Indiana ) was a_minstrel_performer , vaudevillian and popular_personality during the_early_days of radio . He was_best_known as "_Singin_'_Sam , the_Barbasol_Man " for his_long_association with that_company .
